name: The Deep: Coral Craft
description:
The Nektons need your help to build a thriving marine ecosystem! Prepare to craft and puzzle your way from seaweed to shrimp to colourful fish species and more as you turn barren seabeds into self-sustaining reefs.

Use your book of recipes to create aquatic plants and critters. Every organism feeds off of something, and creates something else—so place them strategically on the puzzle board to build a self-sustaining ecosystem! The Aronnax is always nearby to help you create new creatures, and when the Knights are deployed, they can help you rearrange your puzzle board. The more you craft, the more amazing sea life you’ll unlock, from parrot fish to giant sea turtles and more!

Features:
· Join Ant, Fontaine, Will and Kaiko as they embark on a mission to restore life to a barren seabed
· Use the power of the Aronnax to craft new organisms!
· Use the Knights to break rocks and move elements across the board!
· 24 unique puzzle levels to solve
· 20 different recipes to unlock as you go
· Dozens of amazing plants and creatures to discover!
